description.vmax_after_tvl1_trip: Vmax (vh1 <= Vmin <= vh0), maximum voltage at the terminals of the model after the tvh1 timer expires (for overvoltage tripping logic)
description.time_fl_expires: time at which frequency becomes less than fl followed by time at which fl timer expires
description.time_vl1_expires: time at which terminal voltage becomes less than vl1 followed by time at which vl1 timer expires
description.time_fh_expires: time at which frequency becomes greater than fh followed by time at which fh timer expires
description.dbd1_dbd2_out_1: output of voltage deadband dbd1, dbd2
description.dbd1_dbd2_out_0: output of voltage deadband dbd1, dbd2
description.time_vh1_expires: time at which terminal voltage becomes greater than vh1 followed by time at which vh1 timer expires
description.ov_block_mult_out: output of overvoltage voltage multiplier block (0 <= multiplier <= 1)
description.uv_block_mult_out: output of undervoltage voltage multiplier block (0 <= multiplier <= 1)
description.freq_block_mult_out: output of frequency multiplier block (is either 0 or 1)
description.time_vl0_expires: time at which terminal voltage becomes less than vl0 followed by time at which vl0 timer expires
description.vmin_after_tvl1_trip: Vmin (vl0 <= Vmin <= vl1), minimum voltage at the terminals of the model after the tvl1 timer expires (for undervoltage tripping logic)
description.vang_prev: bus voltage angle from previous time step
description.time_vh0_expires: time at which terminal voltage becomes greater than vh0 followed by time at which vh0 timer expires

description.lag: lag block for output of multiplier block
description.iq_lag: lag block representing inner current loop for iq
description.qg_lag: first order lag for reactive current
description.pi_controller_state: PI controller for real power path
description.dpmax_dpmin_lag: first order lag for dpmax and dpmin
description.id_lag: lag block representing inner current loop for id
